versions.description: Must be a semver compatible string (ex. v1, 1, 1.0.0, 1.x) or range (ex 1 - 2, ^1.0.1). See more examples at https://www.npmjs.com/package/semver.

production.description: Whether or not the layer should be published to production

wikidata.description: The Wikidata ID of the region type. Used for i18n translations.

query.description: Query string parameters to append to the data

fieldMapping.description: Specifies map source field names or properties to elastic map service properties

attribution.description: Attribution for map data in different locales when available.

id.description: Manifest id number. These are used as blob file identifiers in the v1 and v2 manifests.

ttl.description: Time to live (seconds) until we recache the data from the source (unused)

weight.description: Weight of layer for ordering. Larger numbers appear higher in order.

createdAt.description: Layer creation date in ISO 8601 format.

legacyIds.description: Identifying names or ids used in legacy versions of EMS

sourceFormat.description: GIS file format for data coming from source

emsFormats.description: Array of GIS file formats exposed in the Elastic Maps Service manifest

contains.description: Exactly one format must be specified as the default format to use.

fieldMap.description: Specifies type, name, source, destination, and description of a field.

name.description: Name of field in vector data

format.description: GIS format such as shapefile, geojson, topojson

default.description: When choosing from multiple formats, use this layer by default

srs.description: Spatial Reference System. Assumed to be EPSG:4326 if not specified.

layer.description: Specifies a layer to use from the given file if necessary

meta.description: Additional properties that can be used to describe and parse the vector file

feature_collection_path.description: For TopoJSON files, the value of the member of `objects` to be used. Refer to https://github.com/topojson/topojson-specification#215-objects
